tariffs.title: Winner
tariffs.description: Participation in unlimited number of procurement procedures
tariffs.price_comment: A fee is charged for each Lot within which the Participant was recognized as the winner of the procurement procedure
tariffs.extra_comment:
The amount of 7100 rubles will be blocked on the personal account at the time of submitting the application.
The fee is not charged for procurements with the initial maximum price that is not exceeding 100,000 rubles (including VAT)

tariffs.title: Procedure for SME only
tariffs.description: Procedure only for small and medium enterprises in accordance with Art. 3.4 of Federal Law No. 223
tariffs.price_comment: of the initial maximum price of the contract, but not exceeding 5,000 rubles (excluding VAT)
tariffs.extra_comment: Fee from a participant, with which a contract is concluded based on the procurement results (including participants that evade the conclusion of a contract)

tariffs.title: Partner
tariffs.description: Participation in unlimited number of procurement procedures

tariffs.title: Partner for 3 months
tariffs.description: Participation in unlimited number of procurement procedures
